install.name: Website Manager
install.author: Qawelesizwe Mlilo
install.description: Custom template for Website Manager site

param.name: showPillboxes
param.label: Show the Pillbox Buttons
param.description: Shows the pillboxes on the homepage

param.name: loginText
param.default: Already a member? access your account now!
param.label: Login bubble text

param.name: signupText
param.default: Not a member yet? Well get on it and access great SEO resources!
param.label: Signup bubble text

param.name: color
param.label: Choose a color theme
param.description: Determines which CSS file to load to apply the proper color scheme.

param.name: bannerModule
param.label: Banner image as a module?
param.description: Allows the banner image to be controlled with a module (user3 position). IMPORTANT NOTE! You will have to style this yourself in the template CSS file.

param.name: bannerImage
param.label: Select a banner
param.description: Enter the image reference for the banner image to use for the homepage (NOTE: Only works if the above option is set to NO)

param.name: download
param.label: Download Box Image
param.description: Enter in the image reference for the download box image.

param.name: downloadLink
param.label: Download Box Link
param.description: Enter in the link where the download box image will point to.

param.name: footerText
param.label: Footer Text
param.description: The footer text area. NOTE: You can use HTML
